fr.enstb.xmlcode
Class HashtableKeyValueProperty

java.lang.Object
  fr.enstb.xmlcode.KeyValueProperty
      fr.enstb.xmlcode.HashtableKeyValueProperty
Direct Known Subclasses:
PropertiesKeyValueProperty
public class HashtableKeyValueProperty
extends KeyValueProperty

A HashtableKeyValueProperty property represents a hashtable-like property, accessible directly by related field or related accessors.

Author:
Sylvain Guerin
See Also:
KeyValueCoder, KeyValueDecoder
